title: 100% Done
heading: Done is 100% done
content:
A major contributions from Scrum and one of the reasons why we use it, is a clear Definition of Done (DoD).

For us, “done” means not just “released” but “full customer satisfaction”. We never stop before that.

For years, when developers used to think that their job was writing code, it was common to hear things like “I am done” after the code was compiling.
Or things like “it works on my machine”. Users were frustrated. Then Scrum introduced the concept of Definition of Done. When you use Teamshore, there is only one definition of done: a delighted customer.
